data.name: Mastery Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Master's Touch skill.

skills.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

data.name: Handicraft Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Handicraft skill.

skills.description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

data.name: Fate Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Good Luck skill.

skills.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

data.name: Hellfire Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Hellfire Cloak skill.

skills.description: Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks after fulfilling certain conditions.

data.name: Leap Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Jump Master skill.

skills.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

data.name: Salvo Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Rapid Fire Up skill.

skills.description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

data.name: Thrift Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Spare Shot skill.

skills.description: Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

data.name: Razor Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Razor Sharp skill.

skills.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

data.name: Spread Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Spread Up skill.

skills.description: Increases the attack power of Spread Ammo and Spread- type arrows

data.name: Pierce Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Pierce Up skill.

skills.description: Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

data.name: Forceshot Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Normal/Rapid Up skill.

skills.description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

data.name: Sharp Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Protective Polish skill.

skills.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

data.name: Blast Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Blast Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Sleep Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Sleep Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Paralyzer Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Paralysis Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Throttle Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Latent Power skill.

skills.description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

data.name: Crisis Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Resuscitate skill.

skills.description: Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status.

data.name: Furor Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Resentment skill.

skills.description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

data.name: Flawless Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Peak Performance skill.

skills.description: Increases attack when your health is full.

data.name: Challenger Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Agitator skill.

skills.description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

data.name: Tenderizer Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Weakness Exploit skill.

skills.description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

data.name: Critical Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Boost skill.

skills.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

data.name: Capacity Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Ammo Up skill.

skills.description: Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

data.name: Guardian Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Offensive Guard skill.

skills.description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

data.name: Fungiform Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Mushroomancer skill.

skills.description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

data.name: Draw Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Draw skill.

skills.description: Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

data.name: Precise Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Ballistics skill.

skills.description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

data.name: Crit Element Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Element skill.

skills.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

data.name: Artillery Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Artillery skill.

skills.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

data.name: Sprinter Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Marathon Runner skill.

skills.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

data.name: Charger Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Focus skill.

skills.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

data.name: Mind's Eye Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Mind's Eye skill.

skills.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

data.name: Potential Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Heroics skill.

skills.description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

data.name: Trueshot Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Special Ammo Boost skill.

skills.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

data.name: Magazine Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Load Shells skill.

skills.description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

data.name: Shield Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Guard Up skill.

skills.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

data.name: Ironwall Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Guard skill.

skills.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

data.name: Refresh Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Stamina Surge skill.

skills.description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

data.name: Enhancer Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Power Prolonger skill.

skills.description: Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.

data.name: Mighty Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Maximum Might skill.

skills.description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

data.name: Attack Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Attack Boost skill.

skills.description: Increases attack power.

data.name: Expert Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Eye skill.

skills.description: Increases affinity.

data.name: Quickswitch Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Rapid Morph skill.

skills.description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

data.name: Absorber Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Recoil Down skill.

skills.description: Reduces recoil when firing bowgun ammo.

data.name: Blunt Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Bludgeoner skill.

skills.description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.

data.name: Quickload Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Reload Speed skill.

skills.description: Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed.

data.name: Steadfast Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Stun Resistance skill.

skills.description: Reduces stun duration.

data.name: Footing Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Tremor Resistance skill.

skills.description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

data.name: Earplug Jewel 3
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Earplugs skill.

skills.description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

data.name: Counter Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Counterstrike skill.

skills.description: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.

data.name: Bubble Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Bubbly Dance skill.

skills.description: Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted.

data.name: Sniper Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Steadiness skill.

skills.description: Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots.

data.name: Gambit Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Punishing Draw skill.

skills.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

data.name: Jumping Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Evade Extender skill.

skills.description: Increases evade distance.

data.name: Evasion Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Evade Window skill.

skills.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

data.name: Brace Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Flinch Free skill.

skills.description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

data.name: Sheath Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Quick Sheathe skill.

skills.description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

data.name: Wind Res Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Windproof skill.

skills.description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

data.name: KO Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Slugger skill.

skills.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

data.name: Friendship Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Wide-Range skill.

skills.description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

data.name: Destroyer Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Partbreaker skill.

skills.description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of monsters.

data.name: Resistor Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Blight Resistance skill.

skills.description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

data.name: Gobbler Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Speed Eating skill.

skills.description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

data.name: Protection Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Divine Blessing skill.

skills.description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

data.name: Wall Run Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Wall Runner skill.

skills.description: Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls.

data.name: Wirebug Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Wirebug Whisperer skill.

skills.description: Improves your handling of Wirebugs.

data.name: Grinder Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Speed Sharpening skill.

skills.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

data.name: Enduring Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Item Prolonger skill.

skills.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

data.name: Recovery Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Recovery Speed skill.

skills.description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

data.name: Medicine Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Recovery Up skill.

skills.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

data.name: Sonorous Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Horn Maestro skill.

skills.description: Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage.

data.name: Drain Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Stamina Thief skill.

skills.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

data.name: Physique Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Constitution skill.

skills.description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

data.name: Venom Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Poison Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Slider Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Affinity Sliding skill.

skills.description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

data.name: Bomber Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Bombardier skill.

skills.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

data.name: Blaze Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Fire Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Stream Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Water Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Bolt Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Thunder Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Frost Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Ice Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Dragon Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Dragon Attack skill.

skills.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

data.name: Defense Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Defense Boost skill.

skills.description: Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases.

data.name: Carver Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Carving Pro skill.

skills.description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

data.name: Rodeo Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Master Mounter skill.

skills.description: Improves your Wyvern Riding skills.

data.name: Hungerless Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Hunger Resistance skill.

skills.description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

data.name: Satiated Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Free Meal skill.

skills.description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

data.name: Muck Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Muck Resistance skill.

skills.description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow.

data.name: Diversion Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Diversion skill.

skills.description: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

data.name: Dive Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Leap of Faith skill.

skills.description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

data.name: Fortitude Jewel 2
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Fortify skill.

skills.description: Increases your attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can be activated twice.)

data.name: Geology Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Geologist skill.

skills.description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

data.name: Botany Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Botanist skill.

skills.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

data.name: Antiblast Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Blast Resistance skill.

skills.description: Grants protection against blastblight.

data.name: Pep Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Sleep Resistance skill.

skills.description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

data.name: Antipara Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Paralysis Resistance skill.

skills.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

data.name: Antidote Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Poison Resistance skill.

skills.description: Reduces damage while poisoned.

data.name: Fire Res Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Fire Resistance skill.

skills.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Water Res Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Water Resistance skill.

skills.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Thunder Res Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Thunder Resistance skill.

skills.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Ice Res Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Ice Resistance skill.

skills.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

data.name: Dragon Res Jewel 1
data.description: A decoration that enhances the Dragon Resistance skill.

skills.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
